Class Car

java.lang.Object
  Car

public class Car
extends java.lang.Object

Write a description of class Car here: This activity is to teach us how to use JavaDoc to write Documentation The Car class models a car with a constant fuel effiency and tracks how much fuel is left in its tank

Version:
(a version number or a date)

Constructor Summary
Car(double fuelEfficiency)
          Constructor for Car that specifies fuel efficiency
 
Method Summary
 void addGas(double gallons)
          Adds the specified number of gallons of fuel to this car's tank.
 void drive(double miles)
          Reduces the fuel in this car's tank based on this car's fuel efficiency and the specified number of miles driven.
 double getGasInTank()
          Returns the number of gallons of gas remaining in this car's tank.
